params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.instance_template
params.description: The URL of the instance template that is specified for this managed instance group. The group uses this template to create new instances in the managed instance group until the targetSize for this version is reached. The templates for existing instances in the group do not change unless you run recreateInstances, run applyUpdatesToInstances, or set the group's updatePolicy.type to PROACTIVE; in those cases, existing instances are updated until the targetSize for this version is reached.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Name of the version. Unique among all versions in the scope of this managed instance group.

params.name: data.target_size
params.description: Specifies the intended number of instances to be created from the instanceTemplate. The final number of instances created from the template will be equal to: - If expressed as a fixed number, the minimum of either targetSize.fixed or instanceGroupManager.targetSize is used. - if expressed as a percent, the targetSize would be (targetSize.percent/100 * InstanceGroupManager.targetSize) If there is a remainder, the number is rounded. If unset, this version will update any remaining instances not updated by another version. Read Starting a canary update for more information.
